import {React,useState} from 'react' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import { FieldErrors } from 'react-hook-form' import './Registration.css' const RegistrationForm = () => { const {register,handleSubmit, formState:{errors}} = useForm() const[useInfo,setUserInfo]= useState(); const onSubmit = (data) =>{ setUserInfo(data) } return (

Registration Form

{errors.username?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.password?.message}

) } export default RegistrationForm
